rating.description: The average rating of the provider (e.g., 4.5).

reviewCount.description: The number of reviews the provider has received.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to support the FixAm Ghana application nationwide, focusing on listing local artisans, enabling contact, displaying location, and managing ratings and reviews. It prioritizes simplicity and scalability for a national MVP. Relationships between entities are maintained through providerId fields, providing a straightforward way to query related data.
